page.title: 13CLUBS IN DOLPHINTON
page.content: Dolphinton Village Hall is the venue for the local activities during the winter. The Carpet Bowling Club is open to adults and children of both sexes. Three bowling boards are avilable for play on Thursday evenings. Games played are rinks, pairs and single-hand. Subscriptions are Â£4, for adults and Â£2 for under 16s. The Badminton Club meets on two evenings per week, from 7pm. till 10.30pm on Tuesdays and Wednesdays. Subscriptions are Â£6 for adults and Â£4 for under 16s. The Womens Rural Institute celebrated its Diamond Jubilee on October 1985. An annual flower and vegetable show is held in august. Entries vary between 400 and 500 including handicrafts, baking and childrens classes. Speakers and demonstrators on subjects like travel, cooking and handicrafts.
